entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.3°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 5. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Tuesday 14 March 2023
